boat.full_description: I bought Puffin in 2010. She's clearly an old boat and still has some original bronze fittings. Her previous owner told me that she was bullt by a carpenter in Liverpool. Her old, very leaky front buoyancy bag had a manufacturing date of 1962 which probably gives a minimum age for her. She's clearly been re-decked at some point. At some point around the millenium her then owners decided to register her with the class association which is why she carries such a high sail number.
boat.name: Puffin
